text.body:
iḵtu “oṉṟāt tamariṉum” (to.po.41) eṉṉuñ cūttirattil “nāḷatu ciṉmaiyu miḷamaiya tarumaiyun - tāḷāṇ pakkamun takutiyatamaitiyu - miṉmaiya tiḷivu muṭaimaiya tuyarcciyu - maṉpiṉa takalamu makaṟciya tarumaiyum” eṉak kūṟiya eṭṭiṉaiyun talaivaṉ kūṟak kēṭṭa tōḻi avaṟṟai “nikaḻntatu kūṟi nilaiyalun tiṇaiyē” (to.po.44) eṉṉum vitiyāṟ ṟalaivaṟkuk kūṟic celavaḻuṅkuvittatu.
arumporuḷ vēṭkaiyi ṉuḷḷan turappap
pirintuṟai cūḻāti yaiya virumpinī
yeṉṟō ḷeḻutiya toyyilum yāḻaniṉ
maintuṭai mārpiṟ cuṇaṅku niṉaittukkāṇ
ceṉṟōr mukappap poruḷuṅ kiṭavā
toḻintava rellāru muṇṇātuñ cellā
riḷamaiyuṅ kāmamu mōrāṅkup peṟṟār
vaḷamai viḻaitakka tuṇṭō vuḷanā
ḷorōokai tammuṭ ṭaḻīi yorōokai
yoṉṟaṉkū ṟāṭai yuṭuppavarē yāyiṉu
moṉṟiṉār vāḻkkaiyē vāḻkkai yaritarō
ceṉṟa viḷamai taraṟku.
COPY STANDOFF FROM INTERFACE HERE
